name: Ester for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Ester is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Christchurch, New Zealand, in family of school teachers, Ester is a modern amazon.

When Ester was 10 her family moved to Auckland and it was a big change in her life. Ester lost all her friends, but she got a possibility to make different kind of sports. And because she was feeling lonely she spent almost all her free time in sport clubs: karate, kickboxing, baseball, for 2 years she was even playing a football. Her body is very athletic.

Ester has a heightened sense of justice. She always do all her best to revenge the abuser. One day she went to this girl’s party the week after she beat the shit out of Ester's friend. While everyone was getting trashed, she went around putting tuna inside all the curtain rods and so like weeks went by and they couldn’t figure out why the house smelled like festering death. They caught Ester through the video where these guys at the party were singing karaoke while she was in the background with a can of tuna.

The time has passed and Ester decided to use her skills on the street. She want to be a prostitute, she will work on the street and protect weaker girls.

Help Ester to take her place on the street!

short_description: Ester is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
